dict.string: Does your child often makes careless mistakes in school/ homework or is careless?
Does your child is often messy in day to day activities?
Does your child often have difficulty in concentrating while playing ?
Does your child often have difficulty in doing routine chores like doing homework, Brushing teeth, Bathing?
Does your child often have trouble in paying attention when somebody is talking to him/her?
Does your child often does not follow instructions despite understanding them and not due to disobedience which makes them unable to complete their work in time?
Does your child often have difficulty getting ready for school?
Does your child often have difficulty putting toys back to their place on their own?
Does your child often avoid activities that require sustained mental efforts(e.g homework/class work, looking at picture book, listening to story?
Does your child often loses things necessary for tasks (e.g. books, pencils, toys)?
Does your child often lose concentration due to little distractions like traffic, road vendors, animal sounds and loses track of the work he/she is doing?
Is your child more forgetful in daily activities compared to other children of his/her age (e.g., bathing, dressing, brushing teeth)?
Does your child often appear restless (e.g. tapping finger, moving hands and feet)?
Does your child often leave his/her seat in the middle of a class or meal?
Does your child often run about/ climb excessively in places where it is inappropriate?( e.g. class room , running about during prayers?
Does your child often unable to engage in play activities quietly (e.g., playing board games, building mud houses, playing with dolls)?
Is your child running around most of the time, even while inside the house or in the market as if driven by a motor?
Does your child often talk excessively?
Does your child often start answering questions even before the question has been completed?
While participating in group activities, is it often difficult for your child to wait for his/her turn?
Does your child frequently interrupt others conversation? (OR) Does your child frequently interrupt the games being played by other children(e.g jumps in conversations, games or activities)?
Does your child often overlooks and misses details?
Does your child is often inaccurate in work assigned?
Does your child often have difficulty focusing on lectures?
Does your child is often finds difficulty in long conversations and reading lengthy stories due to lack of concentration?
Does you often find ur childs mind distracted even without any distractions?
Does your child often starts tasks appropriately but loses focus soon or get easily sidetracked?
Does your child often have difficulty managing sequential tasks and/or difficulty keeping things in order?
Does your child often fail to meet deadlines and /or has poor time management?
Does your child often avoid activities that require sustained mental efforts(e.g preparing reports,completing reports, reviewing lengthy papers)?
Does your child often loses things necessary for tasks( e.g. keys, mobile phones,wallet, eyeglasses, tools, paperwork)?
Does your child often loses concentration due to unrelated thoughts and loses track of the work he/she is doing?
Is your child more forgetful in daily activities compared to other children of his/her age (e.g returning telephone calls, paying bills, keeping appointments)?
Does your child often appear restless(e.g twisting the body when seated, squirming)?
Does your child often leave his/her seat in the workplace or in other situations which require remaining in place?
Does your child often have feeling of restlessness?
Does your child often unable to engage in play activities quietly(e.g playing cards , chess, antakshari)?
Is your child often unable to remain still for extended time as in restaurants and/or meetings?
Does your child often talk excessively?
Does your child often not wait for his/her turn during conversations?
Does your child often finds it difficult to wait in line(e.g for an interview)?
Does your child often disturbs other people in their activities or may takeover what others are doing?
Has the onset been before 12 years of age ?
Does symptoms in your child are present for atleast 6 months duration?
Does symptoms in your child are present atleast in 2 settings?
Can these symptoms be explained by “Intellectual Disability”?
Does symptoms in your child are present for atleast 6 months duration?
Does symptoms in your child are present atleast in 2 settings?
Can these symptoms be explained by “Intellectual Disability”?
